cash_back: Get 0.3% unlimited cashback on All Spend
Get up to 6% cashback on Shopping and Transport Spend with a minimum spend of S$800 for each calendar month.

Minimum Spend Requirement Terms & Conditions: Eligible transaction(s) include retail, recurring bill payments, and refunds in both local and foreign currency that is charged to your DBS Live Fresh Card per calendar month. General exclusions, such as instalments, cash advances, fees charged by DBS and bill payments via internet banking, apply.

Cashback Terms & Conditions: Cashback is capped at S$50 on eligible Shopping spend and S$20 on eligible Transport spend for each calendar month. Refunded transactions will be deducted from the computation of Minimum Spend Requirement and computation of Cashback in the same month that the refunded transactions occurred. Cashback is computed to the nearest 2 decimal places per transaction.

Cashback will be awarded to the Principal Cardmemberâ€™s Card Account (that is of good standing) by the end of the following calendar month. Cashback awarded will be reflected in the monthly Card Account statement.
Cashback will automatically be applied to pay part of the billed amount for that statement month.

online_shopping: Get up to 6% cashback on your shopping spend
Terms & Conditions: Valid with a minimum spend of S$800 for each calendar month. Cashback is capped at S$50 on eligible Shopping Spend for each calendar month.

Shopping Spend refers to in-store and online transaction(s) made in Singapore and overseas and classified under these categories: Apparel, Department Stores, Electronics & Computers, Home/Office Furnishing & Appliances, Personal Services, Specialty Retail and Watches & Jewellery.
